concepts/glossary.title: Glossary of Terms
concepts/glossary.description: This glossary provides a comprehensive overview of terms and concepts within the Superfluid ecosystem.

concepts/in-depth-overview/distributions.title: Distributions
concepts/in-depth-overview/distributions.description: The introduction of streaming distributions marks a significant advancement in web3, offering a scalable method for one-to-many fund transfers.

concepts/in-depth-overview/super-apps.title: Super Apps
concepts/in-depth-overview/super-apps.description: Super Apps represent a class of smart contracts that interact seamlessly with the Superfluid Protocol, enabling dynamic responses to Super Agreements.

concepts/in-depth-overview/super-tokens.title: Super Tokens
concepts/in-depth-overview/super-tokens.description: Super Tokens extend the ERC20 token standard with additional functionalities like Money Streaming or Distributions, known as Super Agreements. There are two types of Super Tokens: wrapper and custom.

concepts/in-depth-overview/superfluid-ho.title: Superfluid Host
concepts/in-depth-overview/superfluid-ho.description: The Superfluid Host Contract is a central element of the Superfluid Protocol, acting as a hub connecting Super Tokens, Super Agreements, and Super Apps.

concepts/intro.title: What is Superfluid?
concepts/intro.description: Superfluid is a revolutionary asset streaming protocol that brings subscriptions, salaries, vesting, and rewards to DAOs and crypto-native businesses worldwide. This is made possible by the protocolâ€™s smart contract framework which introduces the Super Token - an extension to the ERC20 standard that enables digital value to be moved in entirely novel ways.

concepts/use-cases/defi.title: DeFi
concepts/use-cases/defi.description: Superfluid Protocol brings innovative solutions to the DeFi space, allowing for novel applications in financial management and transactions.

concepts/use-cases/gaming.title: Gaming
concepts/use-cases/gaming.description: Superfluid brings a new level of efficiency and scalability to the movement of in-game value. For an in-depth understanding, explore this article on blockchain gaming with Superfluid streams.

concepts/use-cases/recurring-payments.title: Recurring Payments
concepts/use-cases/recurring-payments.description: Superfluid revolutionizes the concept of recurring payments, offering automated and continuous value transfer between accounts. This innovation enables a variety of practical use cases in the realm of decentralized finance.

concepts/use-cases/social-and-community.title: Social & Community
concepts/use-cases/social-and-community.description: Superfluid Protocol introduces innovative methods for community engagement and social token incentives, fostering long-term loyalty and participation.

developers/money-streaming/guides/create.title: Create, Update, and Delete Flows
developers/money-streaming/guides/create.description: This guide covers various methods for managing flows in Superfluid, including direct management by the sender and management via Access Control List (ACL), both on-chain and off-chain.

developers/money-streaming/guides/money-.title: Interact On-Chain
developers/money-streaming/guides/money-.description: This guide delves into the specifics of Superfluid's smart contract functions, offering step-by-step guidance and practical insights for developers.

developers/money-streaming/overview.title: Money Streaming in Superfluid
developers/money-streaming/overview.description: Money Streaming, previously known as Constant Flow Agreement (CFA), revolutionizes the movement of tokens with a by-the-second transfer mechanism. This page provides an in-depth overview of Money Streaming and the unique aspects of Flow NFTs in the Superfluid ecosystem.

developers/super-tokens/guides/deploy-su.title: Deploy Super Tokens
developers/super-tokens/guides/deploy-su.description: This guide offers detailed instructions for deploying different types of Super Tokens within the Superfluid ecosystem, allowing you to customize and deploy all types of Super Tokens.

developers/super-tokens/guides/super-tok.title: Tracking Super Token Balances
developers/super-tokens/guides/super-tok.description: Super Token balances can dynamically change every second, presenting unique challenges and considerations for tracking them within the Ethereum ecosystem.

developers/super-tokens/overview.title: Overview of Super Tokens
developers/super-tokens/overview.description: Super Tokens enhance the ERC20 token standard by integrating additional functionalities like streams and instant distributions, termed as Super Agreements. Super Tokens exist in two primary forms: Wrapper and Pure.
